abstract.para: &app; is a program for performing harmonic analysis (e.g. Fourier Analysis).

sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: Use &app; to transform spectral data into the dual domain and analyse the resultant invere spectrum to extract properties such as fringe visibility, domain shifts and chirp.
For updates please visit Harmonic's Github repository
